content: We offer the best sinks made with the highest quality standards and modern designs to meet your home needs and contemporary décor.
content2: At SIFIN STEEL, we pay attention to the finest details to ensure delivering sinks that combine durability and elegance, making them the perfect choice for any kitchen.
location1: Plot 5/157, Medium Industries Zone, New Beni Suef.
location2: 39 Nemr Maqar St - Ain Shams - Cairo.
aboutp: A Company That produces kitchen sinks made of stainless steel from the finest International materials according to specifications and quality. More than thirty years of experience in the field of stainless steel sink manufacturing.
Features2: Comes with a set of acessories .
Features3: Elegant design suitable for all types of kitchens.
Features4: Processed with the best high-quality stainless steel materials that are resistant to rust.
Kiro Stainless steel: kitchen sink made of stainless steel high-quality
Smart stainless steel: Smart stainless steel kitchen sink no welding
Featursmart3: Digital display for temperature, time and date
smart size: 140mm automatic cooktop features a smart bearing unit.
Smart info: Material sus 304 anti scratch acessories: smart system unit 5 buttons high quality from sus 304 body and cooper cartridge Automatic drainers 140mm stainless steel
info: Stainless steel kitchen sinks, Brand: Kiro, Sifin Steel Manufacture, Lifetime warranty on the body of the sink against manufacturing defects.
